short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A screen-sharing extension allowing you to share all or part of your screen with other participants in your Care2Rock lessons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Care2Rock Lesson Screen Sharing extension allows you to capture and share all or part of your screen with other participants during your Care2Rock online music lessons.
